**_All our curry powder, masala products have curry recipe on the back of the
bag._**

 ** _  Use only 1 and 1/2  level tablespoons of curry powder for .500g of
Meat, Vegetables or Seafood. _** ** _  More FREE recipes available in our
recipe section._**

| • | Bengali Five Spice 50gAlso known as Panch Phuran, our blend of ground
herbs and spices creates Bengali Five Spice and introduces a subtle flavour,
when used in various seafood and vegetable dishes, especially Bengali
potatoes. A delicious, yet essential addition when preparing dhal and lentils
curries and even stews and stir fry vegetables.

• | Biryani Masala 60gAn authentic South African, Indian Masala. Blended with
over (18) roasted and ground herbs and spices to create an exceptional blend
for preparing this specialised Indian dish. An easy to use single serve
sachet, just add your fresh ingredients, like meat and/or vegetables, lentils,
onions, garlic, ginger, plain yogurt and let the roasted blend of spices add
all the flavour. Easy to follow recipe on the packet.

• | Cape-Malay MILD curry powder, masala 200gInfluenced by Malay cuisine,
Cape-Malay curry powder, masala is a blend of sweet and pungent spices like
turmeric, cloves, cardamon, fennel, mustard, corriander, fenugreek, a little
chilli and black pepper. A curry powder, masala of a mild heat yet full of the
flavours you expect in Indian curry. The flavours are particularly delicious
when adding coconut cream or plain yogurt or fresh cream. Can also create a
'satay' flavour with an addition of peanut butter or crushed nuts.  
|

heat and full of the flavours you expect in an Indian curry. Similar in taste

---  
  
## Product Usage:

Curry Powders: 50g = makes (4) curries. 125g size = makes (10) curries. 200g
size = makes (16) curries. Biryani Masala 60g = Makes one pot of Biryani,
serves approx. 6-8 persons. Each pack comes with a recipe on the back of bag.

Each pot of curry will serve approx. a family of (4). These are approximate
estimates, will depend on tablespoon measurement and quantity required per
recipe.  Use level tablespoons. **Metric Measure**  is recommended. (1)
tablespoon= 7- 8 grams in weight

Our products are roasted, dried herbs and spices and will keep fresh for up to
2.5 years in it's re-sealable bag or an airtight container. See, best before
date on pack. Recipe supplied on back of pack.
